model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Black widow movie was awesome. We enjoy lot and had Brazilian foods.
Oh that sounds fun! What is it about?
Black Widow is one of the character in the Marvel Avengers movies. Like Thor and Captain America. Have you seen any of those movies?
No I haven't seen any of those. What foods did you eat while watching the movie?
Wow, there are so many of the movies out there. Don't go see Black Widow without watching Avengers first. I had an amazing steak and vegetables on the side that were delicious. What is you favorite food? 
Oh ok I definitely will watch those first! I love both steak and vegetables! I am a real foodie and love just about everything that isn't too strange to try lol.

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Movie night and family time', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A talks about watching a movie with their family, while Speaker B mentions their little brother spending time on the houseboat.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker A: Does your brother go sailing with you? ### Speaker B: Yes, my brother does sail with me sometimes! How is your family doing? ### Speaker A: My family is well thanks for asking. We are watching a movie tonight. How about your family? How are they? Any plans? ### Speaker B: That sounds like fun! What movie? My family is great. My little brother is spending time with me on my houseboat. ### Speaker A: We're catching the new Black Widow movie. It's so cool that you have a houseboat. It's such good weather to go right now. How has work been lately?' }(2) {'Related Topics': 'Family activities and dining preferences', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A discusses going to a Brazilian steakhouse with their brother, while Speaker B talks about family time on the houseboat.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker A: That's great. I've always said there's something therapeutic about being on the water. It is just so relaxing. Any family members joining you? ### Speaker B: One of my sister's was free today so she came out to enjoy the sun too! She's taking a nap in our hammock we have strung up. What are you doing before dancing? ### Speaker A: Probably just going to grab some dinner with my brother. I haven't seen him this week so I figured it would be good to catch up.  ### Speaker B: Ah that sounds wonderful! Any places you guys really enjoy eating at? ### Speaker A: He likes going to a Brazilian steakhouse where they bring you endless food so we'll probably do that.  ### Speaker B: Oh I love the Brazilian steakhouse! Enjoy your dinner!' }
```
